metadata.name: Pigeon  Blood
metadata.description:
This is the first exhibition at the FoundationÔºÅ
The way of drawing is different from usual.
I usually draw bright pictures.

Part of the proceeds of this work will be donated to the Embassy of Ukraine.

I saw a lot of footage when the battle started.
It's so terrible.  
I wondered if I could do anything. 
And I strongly wanted to draw this work and deliver it. 

Pigeon Blood (A dark ruby gemstone is called Pigeon Blood.  Pigeon Blood's stone language is passion, pure love, courage)

In this work, I dared to separate Pigeon and Brad.
Symbol of peace, dove, olive crown.
Grains dripping from the gem Pigeon Blood.
It can be interpreted in various ways.
Many people in the world are sad.

The rose behind. I mean that person.
That person often gives a bouquet.
The flower language of roses is love. It is a distorted rose with sharp thorns.
It can be interpreted in various ways. 

When someone who agrees with the conflict sees,
I pray that a change will occur in that person's heart.
